Tier 3; BS 50, Melta Weapon Expertise

system.effect: Whenever this character makes a ranged attack with a melta weapon, they increase its Penetration by +2 per Two Degrees of Success scored beyond the first.This Bonus is applied after the benefit of the Melta Quality is applied.
